nodes.text: The Gungan Sling Brigade was a quartet of Gungan performance artists who practiced sling painting. Each of them wore an outfit and a mask the hue of which matched one of the four primary colors and were nicknamed accordingly: Red, Yellow, Blue and Green. With their slings, they would throw paint "balls" of undefined nature—which were in fact natural and grown in the underwater city of Otoh Gunga.
The members of the Sling Brigade had a reputation for never missing their shot, and they enjoyed great popularity amongst the citizens of Theed, capital of the Human colonists of Naboo.
The Gungan Sling Brigade first appeared in Star Wars: Early Learning Activity Center, an educational Star Wars video game released in 2000 by Lucas Learning.
